title: Linda  S. Gottfredson - Resolute ignorance on race and Rushton.p
description:
Politcal Correctness doesn't want you to learn the truth nor get in touch with real science. Instead the promulgate the same statist, antiwhite, communist propaganda labeled as "humanities" without even the slightest piece of empirical evidence behind it. The fact is that real world scientific evidence lies all with the Racial Realists and none with the silly commies.

Here are some excerpts:

"A three-way pattern of mean differences is also seen in personality, with blacks being the most (and East Asians the least) aggressive, impulsive, dominant and sociable, whereas East Asians are the most cautious (and blacks the least) on average. It is also seen in social organization, with East Asians having higher rates of marital stability, law abidingness, and mental health than whites, and whites having higher rates than blacks.
